column1: This comedian talking about A.D.D. Made my life. I know that feel
I would never have watched last comic standing were it not for them playing it on the TV at the gym. Joe’s subtitles are very funny
"I would never date a man for money.
Really? You do it for chlamydia and low self esteem instead.”
omg this lumberjack-looking guy is super cute and funny i’m all about this
